heading: Artists' illustrated books.
general-note: Here are entered works on books illustrated with original prints by well known artists and published in limited editions. Books that are produced by artists and intended as visual art objects and general works about such books are entered under. Artists' books.. Works on existing books whose pages have been altered by paint, collage, or other media are entered under. Altered books.. Works on custom bindings of books, irrespective of contents, are entered under. Fine bindings..
